title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 29 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 29 2022
description:
Clay and Buck's biggest takeaways from the Trump full-hour interview. Larry Kudlow at a loss to explain Biden and Dems' new spending push: "No economic logic." Flashback: In 2000, Bill Clinton Said, "A recession is two quarters in a row of negative growth." Barack Obama in 2010: "You don't raise taxes in a recession." Recidivism rates for NYC’s burglars and thieves soar amid bail reform. Liberal crime policies are an absolute failure everywhere they are implemented. China threatens World War III: "If US fighter jets escort Pelosi’s plane into Taiwan, it is invasion. The PLA has the right to forcibly dispel Pelosi’s plane."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
